name: ci_library_evocation
desc: The evocation section of your library deals with flashy magic, spoken words modified by simple gestures to produce simple elemental effects.
label: Evocation Library

valueDescriptions.0: Bare shelves - your library is empty

valueDescriptions.6: Books and commentaries on the weaving of elemental vibratory ribbons using duomanual techniques
valueDescriptions.7: Tomes and cross-references hinting at anchoring elemental ribbons to achieve permanent effects
valueDescriptions.8: Tomes and cross-references hinting at anchoring elemental ribbons to achieve permanent effects
valueDescriptions.9: An incredible collection of reference material, containing nearly everything you could want to know about the science of evocation
